name: Cyber Samurai (Stikkz)
description:
Prepping the page for my my entry for Game Jam 192 Episode: 3

Gamepad required.

• Use left and right sticks to control the blades

• Block the enemies with the matching blades to build agility and power your weapon

• Fire shuriken with right trigger when weapon available to destroy the devils. Destroy 2 to save the universe

• Protect the sun
